definitions: (of a person) not perturbed or distracted

examples.text: outwardly they are cool, calm, and collected

definitions: (of individual works) brought together in one volume or edition

examples.text: the collected works of Edgar Allan Poe

shortDefinitions: brought together in one volume or edition

definitions: (of a volume or edition) containing all the works of a particular person or category

examples.text: the first collected edition of Mozart's works

shortDefinitions: containing all works of particular person or category

definitions: (of a horse) moving with a shortened stride and with its hind legs correctly placed to achieve balance and impulsion

examples.text: many top riders that instinctively ride a horse collected cannot explain the theory
